text: Miss Hong Kong Pageant 2016 was held together with Mr Hong Kong 2016 in TVB City on 11 September 2016. Ten delegates will competed for the Miss Hong Kong title. Miss Hong Kong 2015 Louisa Mak crowned her successor Crystal Fung. ==Results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable" border="1" |- ! Final results ! Contestant |- | Miss Hong Kong 2016 | Crystal Fung |- | 1st runner- up | Tiffany Lau |- | 2nd runner-up | Bonnie Chan |- | 3rd runner-up | Andrea So |} ===Special Awards=== *Miss Photogenic: Tiffany Lau *Miss Friendship: Bowie Cheung 張寶兒 ==Delegates== The Miss Hong Kong 2016 delegates were: {| class="sortable wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" ! 1st runner-up 2nd runner-up Advance Eliminated ==Judges== *Main Judging Panel: *Miss Photogenic judging panel: **Andy Hui (許志安), Gigi Leung (梁詠琪), Ruco Chan (陳展鵬), Nancy Wu (胡定欣) ==Post- Pageant Notes== * Crystal Fung placed as 2nd runner-up in Miss Chinese International Pageant 2017 in Pahang, Malaysia. ==References== Category:Miss Hong Kong Pageants Category:2016 in Hong Kong Hong Kong
